xldoc.name: host
xldoc.title: Higher Order Set Theory
xldoc.description: An overview of the materials on higher order set theory at OpenMind
xldoc.keywords: x-logic xml higher-order logic set theory foundations semantics

section.title: Overview
section.abstract: Set theory has been fundamental to mathematics throughout the twentieth century. We propose for it a broader foundational role in formal analytics.

section.title: Universal Semantic Foundations
section.abstract: We define a universal semantic foundation system as one which can be used to give an abstract semantics to any coherent language, and argue that Higher Order Set Theory is one (among many).
